entities.name: percy
entities.description: Percy is mentioned as the one who wrote a letter to Ron. The letter is about severing ties with Ron and is torn apart by Ron.

entities.name: padfoot
entities.description: Padfoot is not explicitly described in the text but it can be inferred that Padfoot is a nickname for Sirius Black, who was an Animagus and had the ability to transform into a dog.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as the one who received Percy's letter. He is also described as being upset about the letter and tearing it apart.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as the one who is with Ron when he receives Percy's letter. Harry seems to be trying to calm Ron down.

entities.name: professor sinistra
entities.description: Professor Sinistra is mentioned as the one whose essay is being worked on by Ron and Harry. The essay is described as needing to be finished before dawn.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as the one who offers to help Ron with his homework. She suggests that she will look through it and correct any mistakes.

relationships.description: Ron received a letter from Percy, which he tore apart in anger. The letter was about severing ties between Ron and Percy.
